alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 6:01AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Elevated Water Levels Along The West Coast This Weekend... A strong storm will move northeast to the Central Bering Sea tonight, and then weaken slowly over the weekend. This will bring southeast gale force winds to the Eastern Bering Sea tonight into Saturday. This will cause high surf with minor beach erosion over the Yukon Delta and the Bering Strait and St Lawrence Island late tonight, and to the Southern Seward Peninsula from Golovin west Saturday morning. The high surf is expected to continue into Sundayevening. Tides are expected to be 2 to 3 feet above normal high tides. Elevated surf will spread to north of the Bering Strait on Saturday. Flooding is not expected, but waves will wash to the top of the beach and cause minor erosion. Residents with items on the beach should move them inland tonight to prevent them from washing away.

area.areaDesc: Chukchi Sea Coast; Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills; Southern Seward Peninsula Coast; St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast; Yukon Delta
